StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllRecrui.ngOrgMap]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AS Parent, CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AS Child FROM [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] map WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] ro on map.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY Parent, ro.SHORT_NAME
